channel.title: Static-Site-Generator on dumb by default

item.title: Theme Update 05 02 2023 - Theme Goes Public
item.description: Woah Now you can use slug theme I made solely for this blog. Link to github repo. Although the more I think about how I structured this theme, the less I’m willing to put this into hugo marketplace.

item.title: Theme Update 17 01 2023 - Mermaid Diagram
item.description: Added to theme: mermaid diagram! --- title: Animal example --- classDiagram note "From Duck till Zebra" Animal <|-- Duck note for Duck "

item.title: Theme Update 14-01-2023
item.description: edit 2023-01-15 13:18:21 Nevermind, none of these are used. I decided to go back to server-side rendering with Go-Chroma builtin syntax highlighting https://gohugo.
